title: Cannot create form submit button in empty in form from outside form with with.

labels.name: status:confirmed
labels.description: Bug has been confirmed by the Streamlit team

body:
### Checklist

- [X] I have searched the [existing issues](https://github.com/streamlit/streamlit/issues) for similar issues.
- [X] I added a very descriptive title to this issue.
- [X] I have provided sufficient information below to help reproduce this issue.

### Summary

Cannot create form submit button in empty in form from outside form with with. See below.

### Reproducible Code Example

```Python
working_example = st.empty()
with working_example:
  st.button("OK")
with working_example:
  st.button("Replaced")

with st.form("howdy"):
  st.write("hi")
  e = st.empty()
  with e:
    st.form_submit_button("OK 2")
with e:
  st.form_submit_button("Replaced 2")

### The above gets you this error:
# StreamlitAPIException: `st.form_submit_button()` must be used inside an `st.form()`. For more information, refer to the [documentation for forms](https://docs.streamlit.io/library/api-reference/control-flow/st.form).

### The below, however, gets no error!

working_example = st.empty()
with working_example:
  st.button("OK")
with working_example:
  st.button("Replaced")

with st.form("howdy"):
  st.write("hi")
  e = st.empty()
  e.form_submit_button("OK 2")
e.form_submit_button("Replaced 2")
```
